## Source: ossf-package-analysis (f743a8f88b9838520c2c22fa1950bd4885872db8620318f35b82ba3cdbdd56ff)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'elf-stats-frosty-candy-393' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
